title: snowflake.core.notification_integration.NotificationIntegrationResource | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: Represents a reference to a Snowflake Notification Integration resource.
With this notification integration reference you can delete, and fetch information about them.

if_exists (bool, optional) – Check the existence of this notification integration before dropping it.
Default is None, which is equivalent to False.

Fetch the details of a notification integration.
